member.name: M:AirArena.Accounts.AppleItunesGateway.ChargeCard(AirArena.Accounts.IPaymentMedium,AirArena.Accounts.ICustomer,AirArena.Accounts.IProduct,System.Decimal,System.Decimal,System.String)
member.summary: Unlike other payment Gatweays, new charges can only be instantiated through the storekit in the Iphone app. The ChargeCard method therefore is only used by the scheduler service to check the results of a scheduled transaction processed by the AppStore, and to record and report the results.

member.name: M:AirArena.Accounts.PaymentGateway.IsBlockedBIN(System.String)
member.summary: Used by Credit Card paymentGateways to determin if a transaction should be blocked due to the BIN being untrusted.
member.param: The BIN is the first six digits of the credit card number.
member.returns: True if the gateway is currently blocking on BINs and if the card 's bin is in the blocked list.

member.name: T:AirArena.Accounts.PaymentGateway
member.summary: This class is intended to hold common functionality needed by multiple Ipaymentgateaway instances.

member.name: M:AirArena.Accounts.PayFlowProGateway.Refund(AirArena.Accounts.IPaymentMedium,System.String,System.String,System.Decimal,System.String)
member.summary: Performs a referenced credit transaction. This can only be used to refund a customer where a payment has previously been taken.
member.param: The PNRef of the original charge.
The internal reference number for the transaction.
member.returns: True indicates a successful refund, false indicates an unsuccessful refund

member.name: M:AirArena.Accounts.IPaymentGateway.ValidateCard(AirArena.Accounts.IPaymentMedium,AirArena.Accounts.ICustomer,System.String)
member.summary: Performs a one dollar auth then voids it to ensure that future transactions would succeed. Use this to confirm that a credit card is valid but without charging immediately.

member.summary: Performs a standard Capture transaction, but captures only captureAmount, not the whole amount in productDetails

member.summary: Performs a Voice Authorisation transaction. This can be used where a voic authorisation code has previously been obtained.
member.param: The six digit authorisation code previously obtained by telephone.

member.summary: Performs a referenced credit transaction. This can only be used to refund a customer where a payment has previously been taken.
member.param: Supply the gateway's transaction reference returned with the original charge.
Supply any local invoice or purchaseid number.

member.name: T:AirArena.Accounts.IPaymentGateway.Flags
member.summary: AVSOff signifies that a payment failure because of AVS should NOT of itself cause an otherwise successful transaction to be voided. At the time of coding this ( 05/Jul/2007 ) AVS is only used by the Authorize.Net gateway, so this flag has no meaning for a PayPal gateway CVV2Off has no effect as yet.
